summary: Two Scottish pub football teams play each other in order to resolve a century-old grudge, with the prize for the winning team being the other team's pub.
cast: Max Beesley|Isla Blair|James Cosmo|Laura Fraser|Richard E. Grant|David Hayman|Ian Holm|Neil Morrissey|David O'Hara|Bill Paterson|Iain Robertson|Tom Sizemore|Sally Howitt|Michael Nardone|Samantha Fox|Jonathan Watson|Paul Doonan|Mark O'Hare|Gary McCormack|Hope Ross|Andy Gray|Gary Lewis|Russell Barr|Chris Symes|Edward McQuillan|Ron Donachie|Valerie Hunter|Michael Mullen|Bernard Joy|Emma Crichton|Kay Gallie|Alan Shearer|Ann Murray|Pierce Brosnan|Danny Craine|Stuart MacLeod|Paul Downie|William Mahomet|Scott Lomax|Michael McNaught|Stefan Lopinski|Shaun Russell|Alex MacAuley|Chris Wilson|Alan Winter|Cashie|Kenny Gibson|Shawanna Paris|Laurence Richardson
title: El partido
